p: Cattle, sheep, and goats were sampled in aggregation or meeting points around the communities, and numbers depended on the herd size (10%â€“100% of the herd). The number of herds (owners) and herd size was mainly recorded in 2015 and 2017 and varied with a minimum of 61 herds and a maximum of 178 herds per species and year ( Table S4). Blood was collected from the coccygeal vein in cattle and from the jugular vein in sheep and goats.
